sentence: The Biden administration threatened Wednesday to remove Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from a federal advisory committee if they didn't resign, setting the stage for a public fight with two high-profile GOP Senate candidates.
author: Zoë Richards
title: White House moves to oust Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from presidential advisory panel

title: Dr. Oz Claps Back After Joe Biden Fires Him From President’s Sports Council: Watch

sentence: — Geoff Bennett (@Geoff Bennett) 1648065806 At the same time, Biden reportedly asked for the resignation of a more controversial member of the council, Dr. Mehmet Oz, a thoracic surgeon and medical talk show host first appointed to the advisory council by former President Donald Trump in 2018.

sentence: includes such luminaries as Mehmet Oz, Ben Carson, Scott Atlas, and Ronny Jackson, the dude who turned a slovenly heap of fly-pocked Crisco into a Greek Adonis through the magic of barmy bullsh*t. Now Jackson, who leveraged his unique proximity to Donald Trump’s eminently unkissable bum into a congressional seat, is under investigation by the House Ethics Committee.

sentence: “The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.” During his speech in North Carolina, Mr. Trump praised Mr. Oz’s career, adding that his success on television will serve him well with voters.
author: Joseph Clark
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for Senate

sentence: Former President Donald Trump has endorsed fellow TV personality-turned-politician Dr. Mehmet Oz for the U.S. Senate ahead of the Republican primary in Pennsylvania.
author: Emma Bowman
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania

sentence: Host Alex Marlow breaks down the latest news, including President Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz, Elon Musk backing off Twitter’s board, the latest trans hysteria, the chaos at our border, France’s presidential election, and Big Joey’s latest effort to dis-unify the country.

sentence: That fact was borne out over the weekend when Trump endorsed TV doctor Mehmet Oz over hedge fund rich guy David McCormick in advance of next month's Republican Senate primary.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: The very simple reason why Donald Trump chose Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania
